Name: rolinherit
Description: Role automatically inherits privileges of roles it is a member\nof

Name: rolcatupdate
Description: Role can update system catalogs directly. (Even a superuser\ncannot do this unless this column is true)

Name: rolcanlogin
Description: Role can log in. That is, this role can be given as the initial\nsession authorization identifier

Name: rolreplication
Description: Role is a replication role. That is, this role can initiate\nstreaming replication (see Section 25.2.5) and set/unset the system backup mode using pg_start_backup and pg_stop_backup

Name: rolconnlimit
Description: For roles that can log in, this sets maximum number of\nconcurrent connections this role can make. -1 means no limit.

Name: rolvaliduntil
Description: Password expiry time (only used for password authentication);\nnull if no expiration
